    • Uses of Color in rolit

      Methods in rolit that return Color 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Color Color.fromInt(int i) 
      static Color Color.fromString(java.lang.String color) 
      Color Player.getColor()
      Returns the color of the player.
      Color Board.getField(int field)
      Returns value of field at index field
      Color Board.getField(int col, int row)
      Returns value of field at row,col
      Color Color.next() 
      static Color Color.valueOf(java.lang.String name)
      Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name.
      static Color[] Color.values()
      Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared.
      Methods in rolit with parameters of type Color 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean Board.checkMove(int field, Color color)
      Returns true if a move is valid i.e. it lies next to another (yet occupied) field.
      boolean Board.checkMove(int col, int row, Color color)
      Returns true is a move is valid, by converting the columns and rows into an index to test with checkMove.
      int Board.countFields(Color color)
      Count the amount of fields a player has with its own color
      int Strategy.determineMove(Board b, Color c)
      Determine move according to the strategy algorithm.
      void Board.doMove(int field, Color color)
      Does the move with setField, assuming it can be done and does not violate the rules i.e. there is at least one bordering field that has a color.
      void Board.doMove(int col, int row, Color color)
      Does the move with setField, first converting the rows and columns into an index to test for.
      boolean[] Board.getFlippableFields(Color color)
      Creates an array of booleans with the fields that would flip other's fields if picked.
      int Board.getHint(Color color)
      Returns a hint derived from the strategy used.
      int[] Board.getQuality(Color color)
      Calculate the quality of every field, i.e. calculate the amount of flips that every move will generate.
      boolean Board.hasMostFields(Color color)
      Returns if the color has the most fields on the Board
      boolean Board.isWinner(Color color)
      Check whether a specific player is the winner
      void Player.setColor(Color theColor)
      Sets the color of this player object.
      void Board.setField(int field, Color color)
      Sets a field to the desired Color
      void Board.setField(int col, int row, Color color)
      Sets a field to the desired Color
